languages.text: A {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}-attack the inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against the Cloud Mind have a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
languages.original_text: Атака в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, которая накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и уменьшает количество {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} цели на 2 в течение 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Проверки на сопротивление{/g} Помрачению разума проходят со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −30.

traits.locale_text: A melee-attack inflicting the bleeding and reducing the target's AP and MP by −2 for 2 rounds. Resistance tests against the Cloud Mind have a −30 penalty.
A melee-attack the inflicts bleeding and reduces the target's AP and MP by −2 for 2 rounds. Resistance tests against the Cloud Mind have a −30 penalty.

A {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}-attack the inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against the Cloud Mind have a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}，令目标的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低2点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，对抗蒙蔽思想能力时，抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}会受到−30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。
languages.original_text: A {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}-attack the inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against the Cloud Mind have a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 近战攻击会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}，令目标的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低2点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，对抗蒙蔽思想能力时，抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}会受到−30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を付与し、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を2減らす。鈍った精神に対する抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}は−30の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がつく。
languages.original_text: A {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}-attack the inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against the Cloud Mind have a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 近接攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を付与し、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を2減らす。鈍った精神に対する抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}は−30の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がある。

languages.text: Un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y reduce los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del objetivo en −2 durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de fortaleza contra Ofuscar mente tienen una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −30.

languages.text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, der {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} verursacht und die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Ziels für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} um −2 reduziert. {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen Geist vernebeln haben einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30.
